verses.text: How is the gold become dim!
The precious sons of Zion,
Even the sea monsters draw out the breast,
The tongue of the sucking child cleaveth
They that did feed delicately
For the punishment of the iniquity of the daughter of my people is greater
Her Nazarites were purer than snow,
Their visage is blacker than a coal;
They that be slain with the sword
The hands of the pitiful women
The LORD hath accomplished his fury;
The kings of the earth,
For the sins of her prophets,
They have wandered as blind men in the streets,
They cried unto them, Depart ye; it is unclean;
The anger of the LORD hath divided them;
As for us, our eyes as yet failed
They hunt our steps,
Our persecutors are swifter
The breath of our nostrils, the anointed of the LORD ,
Rejoice and be glad, O daughter of Edom,
The punishment of thine iniquity is accomplished, O daughter of Zion;
